titles.title: STAR Act of 2019
Satellite Television Access Reauthorization Act of 2019
STAR Act of 2019

A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 and title 17, United States Code, to extend expiring provisions relating to the retransmission of signals of television broadcast stations, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Satellite Television Access Reauthorization Act of 2019 or the STAR Act of 2019
This bill extends authority for certain provisions governing retransmission of network station signals by cable systems or other video programming distributors directly to a home satellite antenna.
